Nemesis Enforcer/Manterror/Injector/Stinkbomb:

::Nemesis Enforcer activates his com, leveling his rifle at the CR Chamber::
<Zardus, your future self is revived, I request assistance>

============================================

(Yes, Sniper's Mun, it will, but just ten minutes, wouldn't be fair seeing 
how people aren't on all the time, or that may be moding, but until 
otherwise!  You might want to try and find a way to relieve all of the excess 
energy that is causing the planned explosion, but it won't work in shields or 
weapon systems)

COMPUTER: EXPLOSION IN 8 MINUTES

::Stinkbomb jumped forward at Sniper, stabbing his seringed tail at Sniper's 
left knee::
"Die Alliance scum!" (Sniper should identify himself)

::Ramhorn shot a few shells, spinning and letting weapon fire hit Manterror::

--

::Manterror yelped, getting up and firing an ion disk, Ramhorn rolling out of 
the way::
::Looking to the damaged computer terminal he looked confused:: "Oh...that 
isn't good!" 
::Manterror activates his com, sending the message on a secure channel to all 
Preds::
<This is Manterror, a Predacon warrior, the Ark is gonna blow!> (not that it 
can't be stopped!)

::Injector fired a missile, Stinkbomb's head slamming into a wall, two more 
stinger missiles going at Sniper::

===========

::Nemesis looked to Perndabot:: "Hmmm, stay here.  Zardus will be here 
shortly, hopefully.  We should guard this fool, FZ."
(Nemesis said, pointing to FZ)
